thread.title: Spain finds 300kg of cocaine in pureed banana shipment
thread.title_full: Spain finds 300kg of cocaine in pureed banana shipment | News24

author: news24.com
title: Spain finds 300kg of cocaine in pureed banana shipment
text:
Madrid - Spanish authorities seized 300kg of cocaine worth â‚¬10m from a container loaded with pureed bananas that arrived from Costa Rica, the government tax office said on Thursday.
Police and customs officers found the cocaine on Monday in the Mediterranean port of Valencia, Spain's second busiest port, a tax office spokesperson said.
There were 300 bricks of high quality cocaine in the container and each had a label with the word "xito" (success) on it, he added.
Spanish authorities were trying to figure out the origin of the cocaine, which arrived on September 26 on a boat that departed Puerto Moin just east of San Jose, the capital of Costa Rica.
